newsitem.title: UK: British Energy invests in gas power station - FT.
newsitem.headline: British Energy invests in gas power station - FT.

text.p: British Energy Plc is set to announce investment in its first gas-fired power station, the Financial Times reported on Monday.
The joint announcement with French energy group Elf is expected to involve Humber Power, a power station in Humberside, northeast England, the newspaper said.
British Energy confirmed it had been in discussions with Elf and said its expansion plans could include "entering into partnerships where appropriate", according to the FT.
